import React from 'react' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' // Import Card from react-bootstrap import Rating from './Rating' // Import Rating from './Rating' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' // Import Link from 'react-router-dom' function Product({product}) { return ( {product.name}
(products.rating) reviews
${product.price} ) } export default Product
